General.Name: K. W.  Metal Work Public Company Limited
General.Description: K.W. Metal Work Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and sells parts and accessories for farm machineries primarily in Thailand. The company offers palm leaves, spiral leaf, discus leaves, steer leaves, disc jockey, blades, and dozer blades. It also provides repair and maintenance of equipment, and products from herbal, as well as letting of equipment. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
